about_the_game:
QontoWars is a multiplayer FPS game inspired by CS Half-Life Mod and other early Counter Strike games. It also includes many unique features such as a hilarious skin system and a wide variety of game modes. Atmosphere inspired by game sequels like Unreal Tournament. The novelty of the game is in combining old and new; a game atmosphere reflecting games from the early 2000's whilst having top-notch graphics and a lot of versatility.

Play with your friends in real-time multiplayer in a range of different maps including:
* Dragout (desert outpost with a simple layout good for Deathmatch game-modes)
* Nightout (a nocturnal version of Dragout)
* Timeout (a day-night cycle version of Dragout)
* Choros (COMING SOON! A sci-fi laser-lit city in outer space)
* Genome (COMING SOON! A map that takes place in a coronavirus test lab)
* Trava (COMING SOON! A map that takes place in a fictional village in Ukraine)
* Azimuth (COMING SOON! A sci-fi tunnel system with many hideouts and secret spots)
* Zenith (COMING SOON! Similar to Azimuth, but offers loads of interactable objects e.g. elevators)
* Lucia (COMING SOON! A suspicious subway train station amidst a power cut
* Leviathan (COMING SOON! An island near the mythical land of Tartessos in the bible)
* Sambation (COMING SOON! The remains of an ancient Mesopotamian ziggurat)
* Thrust (COMING SOON! A giant futuristic space station with low gravity physics and an epic vacuum pool)

There is a whole variety of game modes to pick from as well:
* Deathmatch
* Battle Royale
* Team Deathmatch
* Zombie Survival
* Classic (COMING SOON!)
* Capture the Flag (COMING SOON!)
* Domination (COMING SOON!)

The game will offer a wide variety of weapons, although for now it is limited to:
* Knife
* Glock
* AK-47
* MP5
* AWP
* Grenade
* COMING SOON: M4A1
* COMING SOON: RPG
* COMING SOON: M3 Shotgun
* COMING SOON: P90
* COMING SOON: SVD-63
* COMING SOON: Flashbang
* COMING SOON: Smoke Grenade
* COMING SOON: Firebomb

Game controls:
WASD = Movement
Mouse 1 = Shoot/Slash
Mouse 2 = Scope/Aim/Stab
R = Reload
T = Switch Firemode
F = [Toggle] Flashlight
SPACE = Jump
Left CTRL = [Hold] Crouch
Shift = [Toggle] Ladder Mode
ESC = Pause Menu
TAB = [Hold] Scoreboard
M = [Toggle] Team Menu
1 = Primary Weapon (Rifle) Slot
2 = Secondary Weapon (Pistol) Slot
3 = Tertiary Weapon (Melee) Slot
4 = Throw a grenade. Hold in air to aim and release the key in order to throw it.
** Note that quaternary weapon slots are not available yet. Very soon, they will be.
